sentences.english: Cyanobacteria are autotrophic prokaryotes performing oxygenic photosynthesis similar to that of higher plants.
sentences.chinese: 蓝藻是一类能进行光合放氧作用的原核生物。

sentences.english: Applying to cyanobacteria system, some points about the cyanobacterial blooming and extinction have been explained.
sentences.chinese: 应用于蓝藻系统，说明水华蓝藻生消的一些问题。

sentences.english: Applying to cyanobacteria system, some points about the cyanobacterial blooming and extinction have been explained.
sentences.chinese: 应用于蓝藻系统，说明水华蓝藻生消的一些问题。

sentences.english: They tested alginate from brown algae.
sentences.chinese: 他们测试了从蓝藻中得到的褐藻胶。

sentences.english: Can I treat my water at home to remove blue-green algae and their toxins?
sentences.chinese: 我对我的水可以在家清除蓝藻及其毒素？

sentences.english: Microcystis aeruginosa is a kind of toxic cyanobacteria that wide-ranging living in stagnant water.
sentences.chinese: 铜绿微囊藻是一种广泛存在于静水水体中的有毒蓝藻。

sentences.english: Release of sediment phosphorus is also an outbreak of algal blooms in the required source of nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 底泥中磷的释放也是蓝藻水华暴发所需的营养源。

sentences.english: The development on studying identification technology of chlamydomonas reinhaidtii is summarized.
sentences.chinese: 综述了近年来在水华蓝藻鉴定技术方面的研究进展。

sentences.english: “It would quickly consume all the available nutrients, ” he says.
sentences.chinese: “镜像蓝藻会很快消耗掉所有可用的养料，”他说。

sentences.english: A dead fish is seen next to the blue-green algae bloom affecting Lake Tai.
sentences.chinese: 一个死鱼看到旁边的蓝藻水华影响太湖。

sentences.english: A different method was used with the GM algae.
sentences.chinese: 转基因蓝藻的使用方法略有不同。

sentences.english: Treatments to counteract the effects of cyanobacterial toxins in animals have not been extensively investigated to date.
sentences.chinese: 治疗抗衡蓝藻毒素影响动物调查至今尚未广泛。
